article_title: Presentation: Tips for vetting revenue cycle vendors
article_text: Mike Simms, vice president for revenue cycle at Cone Health, has more than a few good tips when it comes to choosing a revenue cycle vendor. At the same time, success doesn't come from technology alone. For Cone, a full reorganization of its revenue cycle department was necessary. Simms gave the detailed presentation, "Best Practices for Vetting Vendors, Boosting Performance, and Driving ROI" at last week's Revenue Cycle Solutions Summit at the HIMSS15 conference. Here are his slides, for those who could not make the event.
